atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use @layer to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use @responsive to generate responsive variants of custom styles.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Use @screen to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use @variants to generate hover, focus, and other state variants for custom styles.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: TailwindCSS v4 directive for defining custom variants.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: TailwindCSS v4 directive for defining theme values.
